error.message: 這個物件沒有定義無參數的建構函式。
error.detail: System.InvalidOperationException: 嘗試建立型別 'WebAp.Controllers.HomeController' 的控制器時發生錯誤。請確認此控制器是否有無參數公用建構函式。 ---> System.MissingMethodException: 這個物件沒有定義無參數的建構函式。 於 System.RuntimeTypeHandle.CreateInstance(RuntimeType type, Boolean publicOnly, Boolean noCheck, Boolean& canBeCached, RuntimeMethodHandleInternal& ctor, Boolean& bNeedSecurityCheck) 於 System.RuntimeType.CreateInstanceSlow(Boolean publicOnly, Boolean skipCheckThis, Boolean fillCache, StackCrawlMark& stackMark) 於 System.RuntimeType.CreateInstanceDefaultCtor(Boolean publicOnly, Boolean skipCheckThis, Boolean fillCache, StackCrawlMark& stackMark) 於 System.Activator.CreateInstance(Type type, Boolean nonPublic) 於 System.Activator.CreateInstance(Type type) 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.DefaultControllerActivator.Create(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType) --- 內部例外狀況堆疊追蹤的結尾 --- 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.DefaultControllerActivator.Create(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType) 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType) 於 System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.CreateController(RequestContext requestContext, String controllerName) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.ProcessRequestInit(HttpContextBase httpContext, IController& controller, IControllerFactory& factory) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContextBase httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 於 System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, Object extraData) 於 System.Web.HttpApplication.CallHandlerExecutionStep.System.Web.HttpApplication.IExecutionStep.Execute() 於 System.Web.HttpApplication.ExecuteStep(IExecutionStep step, Boolean& completedSynchronously)
